=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: HIFAU Eyebrow Scissors 3 In 1 Kit, Eyebrow Razor and Comb Foldable Protection, Surgical Grade Stainless Steel Eyebrow Scissors and Tweezers, Mirror Polished, Easy to Carry, Travel Gift
Review Date: 2020/02/07
Store: HIFAU
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '6.1 x 2.4 x 0.4 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '634923554380'}
Review Text: The razor cuts your skin but not your hair. The comb is cheap plastic that breaks if you look at it sideways. The tweezers aren't very good at gripping. The only good thing about this set are the little scissors. Those work well.
Review Title: The scissors are the only things that work
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Type:A - Aluminum Free Deodorant for Men – Trailblazer- Unscented, Spice & Forest – Sweat Activated Technology, Natural Ingredients, Non-Toxic, Paraben Free, Non-Irritating, 2.8 Ounce (3 Pack)
type:A
{'Brand': 'Type:A', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Unit Count': '3.00 Count', 'Item Volume': '2.8 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '6.8 x 5 x 0.5 inches; 9.59 Ounces'}
It doesn't work as well as old spice to prevent odor and sweat, but it does leave less residue on shirts. The spice scent smells like patchouli and mint, the evergreen scent smells strongly of pine trees, and unscented smells like baby powder. I can't say we are particularly fond of any of the scents. My husband is planning to use this set up, but we will probably not reorder it.
Not fond of the smells
Workman's Friend Ultimate Hand Care Bundle
WORKMAN'S FRIEND
{'Package Dimensions': '9 x 4.5 x 2.3 inches; 1.3 Pounds', 'UPC': '023857030709'}
We do a lot of house work, art, construction work, and gardening. We use a lot of soap. That orange goop with pumice in it is our normal heavy duty hand cleaner, this soap is equivalent to that soap without the orange scent. You definitely do need water for it to be effective even though the bottle claims you don't. The hand cream is a great heavy duty healing lotion, similar to eucerin. I haven't noticed an appreciable difference in the ease of cleanymy hands after using the barrier cream however.
Helps dirty hands

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Product Preference**: The user continues to seek effective personal care products, particularly deodorants and heavy-duty hand care items, emphasizing performance in odor and sweat prevention as well as cleaning efficacy.

- **Scent Sensitivity**: There is a strong aversion to strong or specific scents; the user prefers truly neutral or mild fragrances and has had negative experiences with scents like patchouli, mint, and pine. 

- **Texture, Residue, and Effectiveness**: The user appreciates products that leave minimal residue and avoid greasy or staining properties. They value effectiveness and user experience, often comparing against well-known brands. They recently highlighted a hand soap that performs similarly to heavily-scented options without the offensive scent, indicating a preference for practical, sensory-sensitive solutions.

- **Natural Ingredients**: A clear preference for natural, non-toxic products free from harmful chemicals is evident, showcasing a conscientious approach to personal care.

- **Grooming Tools Evaluation**: The user recently purchased a grooming kit which received a low overall rating due to ineffective components. While they found one item useful, their review highlights a critical perspective on performance and quality in tools, mirroring their approach to other personal care products.

- **Reorder Willingness**: The user is cautious about reordering products that do not fully meet their expectations and is open to exploring alternatives that align with their quality, safety, and sensory preferences.

Overall, the user demonstrates a thoughtful approach to personal care, focusing on effectiveness, ingredient safety, and a critical stance on product performance across various categories.
